original_text: Everyone who heard about these things thought about them. They asked each other, ‘When this child becomes a man, what will he be?’ They could see that God really was with him. Zechariah's song Everyone who heard about these things thought about them. They asked each other, ‘When this child becomes a man, what will he be?’ They could see that God really was with him.
korean_text: 듣는 사람이 다 이 말을 마음에 두며 이르되 이 아이가 장차 어찌 될까 하니 이는 주의 손이 그와 함께 하심이러라

sentences.original_text: Everyone who heard about these things
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 일을 들은 모든 사람이

sentences.original_text: When this child becomes a man
that God really was with him
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 정말 그와 함께 계신다는 것을
